In this session, you will do a hands on exercise on machine learning fundamentals. Pair up with your neighbour and get started!

## Kaggle

Create a (free) Kaggle account. You will run the Jupyter notebook for this exercise using Kaggle notebooks.

## Notebook Download

You can find the exercise notebook [here](https://github.com/kvarada/Intro-to-ML-workshop-2024/blob/main/website/slides/downloads/exercise-01-ml-fundamentals.ipynb)
